title.rendered: Join Us For Automation Hour, a New Webinar Series!

content.rendered:
If you are a Salesforce Admin, Developer, Analyst, Architect, or anyone else that does automation of anything in Salesforce, the new Salesforce Automation Hour is for you!

Fabulous hosts, David Litton, the Automation Champion himself, Rakesh Gupta, and Trailhead Superstar, Jennifer Lee, will be sharing Process Builder and Flow automation solutions and answering your automation questions every other Friday at 3 ET/Noon PT.

Oh! don’t forget to join the Success Community Group for more automation tips, hints, and community help.

excerpt.rendered: If you are a Salesforce Admin, Developer, Analyst, Architect, or anyone else that does automation of anything in Salesforce, the new Salesforce Automation Hour is for you!

@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Me for Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey 12/16/16
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce Automation Hour is a Webinar series to demonstrate all levels of declarative Automation inside Salesforce. Webinar Name: Salesforce Automation Hour -12/16/2016 Time: 12pm PST (3pm EST) Presenter: Meighan Brodkey Webinar Registration Link: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8207021249714603267 Find the webinar resources here. Make sure you join us on the Success Community!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Move Related Lists On Lead Convert
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: It's not magic, it's Process Builder! Learn how you can move records related to Leads over to the Contact on Lead conversion, with a simple process.

img.alt_text: Move Related Lists On Lead Convert

jetpack-related-posts.title: Login Flow Deployment
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Update for Login Flow Deployments with Spring 21 and their new availability in the metadata API making them deployable!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Lightning Ideas Delivered
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Know what I like about Salesforce? Well, one thing I really like.... The fact that they listen, seriously.  Are you using the IdeaExchange?  If not, you need to stop reading now, and go check it out before you read on.  Not only do I like the IdeaExchange so I can…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Salesforce Events 2020 is live!! That's right Ohana, it wouldn't be my blog if I wasn't talking about events and how we connect and get together as humans.  For real, we get out from behind the keyboard, and even leave the HOUSE!!! I know, it's crazy, but for Ohana,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seattle WIT User Group May 13th Happy Hour
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Are you a Salesforce woman in technology or a supporter of Salesforce women in technology? Are you located in the Greater Seattle area?  If you answered yes to both of the questions above, you should register for the Seattle Women in Tech User group Happy Hour on Friday, May 13th…
